text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump FACTS

US is 4% of world population

US is 31% of Covid Cases & 21% of Covid deaths

Quite simply, the US is suffering significantly more then any other country because of TRUMP’s Denial, Delay's, Deflection & Deception 

He is an Evil Coward

Retweet please

#COVID #coronavirus
